itinerary.mapNote: Last village before glacier. Jeep from Skardu. Trek starts. 3040m.
First camp on Braldu River flats. 3100m.
Last trees before glacier. Shaded poplar grove. Trango in sight. 3388m.
On Baltoro Glacier. Trango Towers and Cathedrals now close. 3720m.
Grassy ledge above glacier. Best camp on the Baltoro. 4050m.
Glacier moraine. Broad Peak, Gasherbrum & K2 all visible. 4285m.
Throne of the Gods. Confluence of Baltoro & Godwin-Austen glaciers. 4650m.
Day-trip to K2 Base Camp 5150m and return. Sleep Concordia. 4650m.
Turn south toward Gondogoro La. High camp. 5050m.

itinerary.route: Ali Camp to Khuspang via Pass
itinerary.mapNote: After Gondogoro La 5650m — trek highpoint. Long descent. 4500m.
End of trekking. Last camp in Hushe Valley. 3050m.
Jeep drive out. Trek complete. Skardu airport. 2228m.

waypoints.name: K2 Summit
waypoints.note: World's second highest and deadliest 8000er. 'Savage Mountain'.

waypoints.name: K2 Base Camp
waypoints.note: South-east BC on Godwin-Austen Glacier. Day trip from Concordia.

waypoints.name: Concordia
waypoints.note: Throne of the Gods. 4 of world's 14 8000m peaks visible simultaneously.

waypoints.name: Trango Towers
waypoints.note: World's tallest sheer rock faces. Climbers' mecca. Vertical 1340m.

waypoints.name: Gondogoro La Pass
waypoints.note: Trek highpoint. Dramatic exit pass. K2 and Broad Peak final views.

waypoints.name: Urdukas Camp
waypoints.note: Grassy ledge above glacier. Most scenic camp. Cathedral spires.

waypoints.name: Broad Peak
waypoints.note: 12th highest peak. Visible from Concordia area.
